name: password_change_notification_using_sendgrid
title: Password Change Notification Using SendGrid
description: End user security is a major concern for all CIAM customers. Account takeover can be mitigated by notifying an end user when their password has changed,thereby alerting them in the event that it was performed without their knowledge. Branding this notification across multiple application brands is important. Workflows can act on a password change event and send a customized notice to the end user.
